Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shopaholic
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera for my husband. He absolutely loves it. He had a canon rebel xs before he got this one. This camera does so much more. This is one gift he'll continue to use for some time. He took our family portrait and it turned out great!!!!... Thanks

Reviews.Title: Can you say possible "Class Action Law Suit"?
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Berggren "Peter Berggren"
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as the next step in building a professional photography business. Photographing Sky Divers needs multiple frames per second and this seemed to be the best camera for the price. Unfortunately, it has a very bad focusing problem that Canon is refusing to recognize. The Canon reps acted like high school kids, not knowing much about the camera or photography at all. The supervisors keep directing people back and forth and trying to make the photographer feel the problem is his fault rather than the fact that some of their cameras may have a "malfunction" and they don't want to admit it.Here is a link to a forum discussing the problem with many photographers;[...]Some people say their camera is fine so it might just be only 1 camera in 10 but if you are the lucky one to get that 1, good luck getting taken care of by Canon.

Reviews.Title: Price is HIGH
Reviews.Author: rabinarayan
Reviews.Content: No doubt this camera with 15-85 lens is an excellent combination.But, this price is little HIGH. It Should be $1700 to $1800.I have bought one 7D with 15-85 in $2020 in Feb 2012.I got it with decent accessories(32GB Card + Battery + Case + Tripod + UV Filter + Cleaning Accessory Kit)Whoever wants to order, please wait for some more time definitely the price has to come down soon.
